doc.title: ieat Video Blogs: ieat learns to make Miso Soup!
doc.text: Miso/JJ Soup/NN is/VBZ the/DT most/JJS basic/JJ of/IN Japanese/NN Cooking/NN ./. My/PRP$ mother/NN used/VBD to/TO tell/VB me/PRP that/WDT when/WRB you/PRP have/VBP no/RB money/NN you/PRP eat/VB rice/NN with/IN soy/NN sauce/NN ./. Chef/NNP Tom/NNP tells/VBZ me/PRP that/WDT in/IN Japan/NNP ,/, if/IN you/PRP have/VBP no/RB money/NN ,/, you/PRP eat/VB rice/NN with/IN Miso/NN Soup/NN ./. In/IN this/DT video/NN ,/, Chef/NN Tom/NN shows/. us/PRP how/RB to/TO make/VB a/DT very/RB simple/JJ miso/NN soup/NN ./. Although/CC ,/, in/IN Singapore/NNP ,/, it/PRP will/MD still/RB be/VB cheaper/VBD if/IN you/PRP ate/VBD rice/NN with/IN soy/NN sauce/NN as/IN all/DT these/DT Japanese/JJ ingredients/NNS are/VBP not/RB cheap/JJ !/.
